DOC.brief_summary: The aim study evaluate clinical efficacy safety inhale zanamivir treatment influenza A B virus infection China .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Inhaled Zanamivir Treatment Influenza A B Virus Infections China
DOC.criteria: Who fever ( > 38.0ºC ) At least two follow symptom : chill , headache , myalgia , fatigue , nasal symptom , sore throat , cough Started therapy within 48 hour onset influenzalike illness Written inform consent Respiratory disease , asthma COPD Woman positive urine pregnancy test Woman without contraception study Allergic zanamivir , Paracetamol lactose WBC ≥ 10.5×109/L ; neutrophil percentage ≥ 80 % Hepatic function impairment : AST ≥ 2×ULN , ALT ≥ 2×ULN Renal function impairment : Cr > 221μmol/L Influenza vaccination 12 month prior begin study History tumor , psychiatric disorder , epilepsy drug abuse Patients receive corticosteroid , immunosuppressant HIV positive
